movies.title: Ringu 2
movies.plot: In this sequel to Ringu (1998), Mai Takano is trying to learn more about the death of her boyfriend, Ryuji. She soon hears stories about a videotape haunted by the spirit of a girl named Sadako, who died many years earlier. Supposedly, anyone watching the tape will die of fright exactly one week later. After some investigating, she learns that Ryuji's son, Youichi, is developing the same psychic powers that Sadako had when she was alive. Mai must now find some way to keep Yuuichi and herself from becoming Sadako's next victims.
movies.simplePlot: Reiko takes Yoichi into hiding when her son begins to display frightening powers. Meanwhile, Mai Takano and the authorities begin a desperate search for them, as the mysterious Ring curse spreads...

biography.bio: Miki Nakatani was born on January 12, 1976 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Ringu (1998), Memories of Matsuko (2006) and Ringu 2 (1999).
biography.name: Miki Nakatani

biography.bio: Hitomi Satô was born on October 10, 1979 in Aichi, Japan. She is known for her work on Ringu (1998), Le royaume des chats (2002) and Ringu 2 (1999).
biography.name: Hitomi Satô

biography.bio: Kyoko Fukada was born on November 2, 1982 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Kamikaze Girls (2004), Dolls (2002) and Ringu 2 (1999).
biography.name: Kyoko Fukada

biography.bio: Fumiyo Kohinata was born on January 23, 1954 in Mikasa, Hokkaido, Japan. He is an actor, known for Dark Water (2002), Audition (1999) and Ringu 2 (1999).
biography.name: Fumiyo Kohinata

biography.bio: Kenjirô Ishimaru was born on November 1, 1953 in Oita, Japan. He is an actor, known for Ringu 2 (1999), Tokyo! (2008) and Onmyoji: The Yin Yang Master (2001).
biography.name: Kenjirô Ishimaru

biography.bio: Yûrei Yanagi was born on April 8, 1963 in Hiroshima Prefecture, Japan as Masahiko Ono. He is an actor, known for Boiling Point (1990), Ringu (1998) and Ju-on: The Curse (2000). He has been married to Atsuko Kawada since 1999.
biography.name: Yûrei Yanagi

biography.bio: Rikiya Otaka was born 27th August 1991 in Tokyo. In 1997, when he was only six, he was chosen out of many young boys to play the part of the little seven year old Yoichi Asakawa in Ringu (1998). Today, he is (alongside _Hiroyuki Sanada_ who played Ryuji Takayama in 'Ringu') the most credited and popular male character in the entire 'Ringu' series. He resorted his role as Yoichi a year after the first sequel 'Spiral' was a failure in the cinemas. In Ringu 2 (1999), his character was the supporting male actor, so he was working twice as hard this time, but enjoyed every moment. It was fun playing Yoichi again. In 2000, he was doing extras work mainly, and even made a notable appearance in the hit TV series _"Karmen Rider Agito" (2001)_. He then once again joined Hideo Nakata for a separate piece of work when he played Yuuchi in _Sleeping Bride (2000)_. He has also made small appearance in Kuroe (2001) and The Sea Is Watching (2002). People were beginning to notice Rikiya Otaka. He the starred in a drama movie _Catharisis (2003)_ as the youngest brother of a family, angry at his elder brother for dividing the family. He then starred as the main players best friend in BBK Basketball Kids. In 2004 and 2005, he was on the the large budget, drama-history film Year One in the North (2005), playing the Mamiya's son.
biography.name: Rikiya Ôtaka

biography.bio: Yôichi Numata was born on July 19, 1924 in Okayama, Japan as Mikamo Masaharu. He was an actor, known for Ringu (1998), Ringu 2 (1999) and The Princess Blade (2001). He died on April 29, 2006 in Tokorozawa, Saitama, Japan.
biography.name: Yôichi Numata

biography.bio: Masako was born on July 30, 1964 in Tokyo, Japan. She was an actress, known for Ringu (1998), Ringu 2 (1999) and Ringu 0 (2000). She died on January 29, 2015 in Tokyo.
biography.name: Masako

biography.bio: Miwako Kaji is an actress, known for Ringu (1998), Ringu 2 (1999) and The Tale of Genji (1987).
biography.name: Miwako Kaji

biography.bio: Katsumi Muramatsu was born on September 10, 1939 in Kawaguchi, Saitama, Japan. He was an actor, known for Ringu (1998), Ringu 2 (1999) and Laundry (2002). He died on December 1, 2001 in Kawagoe, Saitama.
biography.name: Katsumi Muramatsu

biography.bio: Daisuke Ban is a graduate of Saitama-Ken Senior High School. After making his debut in OUMUTO NI WATORI (1971), he got his first starring role as the android Jiroo in the popular TV series "Jinzo ningen kikaidaa" (1972). Since then, he starred in other superhero shows including INAZUMAN (1973), NINJA CAPTOR (1976) and BATTLE FEVER J (1979), as well as action shows like SPECIAL INVESTIGATION FRONTLINE. To this day, Daisuke also attends sci-fi and comic-book conventions in Japan to greet fans of the shows he starred in.
biography.name: Daisuke Ban

biography.bio: Rie Ino'o is an actress, known for Ringu (1998), Ringu 2 (1999) and Inugami, l'esprit du mal (2001).
biography.name: Rie Ino'o

biography.bio: Reita Serizawa is an actor, known for Ringu 2 (1999), Boy's Choir (2000) and Ju-on: The Curse (2000).
biography.name: Reita Serizawa

biography.bio: Shinmei Tsuji is an actor, known for Le soleil (2005), Ringu 2 (1999) and La vallée des fleurs (2006).
biography.name: Shinmei Tsuji
